name: HYPERSURF
description:
[ HYPERSURF ] 

Welcome to Hypersurf! Play as Kiki the cat and surf through chiptune music in this two-button rhythm game.

______________________________________________

This game contains:

  • 9 unique levels featuring chiptune music made by How2Bboss
  • Gameplay which involves using two buttons only: up and down. Easy to learn, but hard to master
  • Color-blind friendly, 1 bit graphics with different color palettes for each level
  • A cat... which is surfing!

__________________________________________

For more projects like this, follow me on Twitter and join my Discord. Have a nice day!

______________________________________________

PSST: If the arrow notes are giving you a hard time, you can turn them off in the settings.

Controls:Move/NavigateUP / DOWNW /SSelectSPACEENTERRestartZ-Back to MenuX-(Quick) RestartR-(Quick) Back to MenuESCAPE-(Alt-Menu) Select Z-(Alt-Menu) BackX-(Hold-Menu) Delete Save FileDELETE-
